max_disk_usage: 50

  - "/"

  - "/Library"
  - "/Applications"
  - "/usr"
  - "/etc"
  - "/var"
  - "/bin"
  - "/sbin"

    name: "daily"
    description: "Daily cleanup"
    enabled

        description: "Clean Nix generations"
        risk_level: "LOW"
        enabled: true

        description: "Clean Nix generations"
